objects.text:
• HyperMagnetic Adjustable Switches
• Compact 60% Form Factor
• Dual Wireless + USB-C

product_details.description: The Apex Pro Mini Wireless is the world's first Hall Effect magnetic switch gaming keyboard. Featuring OmniPoint 2.0 Adjustable HyperMagnetic Switches with Rapid Trigger, total adjustability of actuation points, and 2-in-1 Acton keys for 20x quicker actuation and 11x faster response, all while playing on a compact, 60% keyboard. FULLY CUSTOMIZABLE & STUPIDLY FAST with OmniPoint 2.0 Adjustable HyperMagnetic switches RAPID TRIGGER — Eradicate latency arising from the physical movement of the switch through dynamic activation and deactivation of keys based on travel distance rather than a fixed point in the key travel. ULTIMATE CONTROL — 40 levels of per-key actuation (0.1 – 4.0mm) – set WASD for light, ultra-fast movements and set ability keys to deep presses to avoid accidentally triggering specials 2-IN-1 ACTION KEYS — Program two different actions to the same key, such as walking with a light touch or sprinting with a deep press 20x faster actuation, 11x faster response than traditional mechanical keyboards Lag-free Quantum 2.0 Dual Wireless with a 2.4GHz connection and Bluetooth 5.0 60% form factor. Full-size functionality. Premium aluminum top plate. Detachable USB-C. Brand - SteelSeries ** Compatible Devices - PC, Gaming Console ** Connectivity Technology - wired, wireless ** Keyboard Description - Mechanical, Gaming ** Recommended Uses For Product - Gaming ** Special Feature - Ergonomic ** Color - Pro Gen 2 ** Number of Keys - 61 ** Keyboard backlighting color support - RGB ** Style - Pro Gen 2 Wireless **

banner_details:
This banner showcases a sleek, tech-savvy layout tailored for gaming gear. The background is a deep matte black (#121212) with a section of dark grey (#1A1A1A) rounded panel on the left side holding the textual content. A vertical multicolor gradient stripe, along with faint white grid lines and colorful horizontal bars, adds motion and RGB-style energy to the design. The composition features five main text layers — “heading” for the title, “subheading” for category emphasis in bright orange, “description” for feature highlights, “price” for cost emphasis, and “cta” styled inside a bold orange button. The product image sits prominently on the right.

**Color Palette**:
- Background Black: #121212  
- Dark Grey Panel: #1A1A1A  
- Accent Orange: #FF9900  
- Text White: #FFFFFF  
- CTA Text: #000000  
- RGB Gradient: #FF3300, #FFCC00, #33CC33, #0099FF, #9933FF, #FF3399
product_color: The product image showcases a vibrant mechanical keyboard illuminated with dynamic RGB lighting. The primary color palette includes Electric Blue (#00FFFF), Neon Pink (#FF00FF), Bright Red (#FF4500), Vivid Orange (#FFA500), Bright Yellow (#FFFF00), and Lime Green (#32CD32). These neon hues are contrasted against the matte Black keycaps (#1C1C1C), enhancing their luminosity. Colors are seamlessly blended in horizontal waves across the keyboard, giving a glowing spectrum effect, while the translucent keycap edges allow each hue to pop individually. This striking palette effectively balances bold lighting and sleek design, ideal for tech or gaming-themed advertisement banners with high visual impact.
